About Me

Hello! I'm Adele, a 4th year student at Abertay University, studying Computer Games Applications Development (CGAD).

When working, I enjoy programming and designing games, and in my free time, I enjoy playing games with friends!

Elusive Core: Zero Trace

Elusive Core: Zero Trace is a stealth platformer that I worked on in 3rd year of CGAD, together with 7 other students of various roles.

It's made in Unity, and I helped design the game as well as program it.
